Package slotmachine.model.slots

Interface WinSettings

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    WinSettingsImpl
    public interface WinSettings
    Supporting interface used in the Further Programming Assignment

    This interface is be implemented as WinSettingsImpl and is supplied in the start up code.

    The concrete class is a helper class which provides a means to obtain the winning odds of a given SlotLine. These odds can than be used to calculate the outcome of a bet (per line).

    Author:
    Ross Nye
    See Also:
    SlotMachine.applySpinResult(SpinResult), SpinResult, SlotLine, SlotItem

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int getWinOdds​(SlotLine slotLine)
      Returns the winning odds of the supplied line, or zero if it's not winning line.
      int getWinSimplified​(SlotItem slot1, SlotItem slot2, SlotItem slot3)
      The simplified version of getWinOdds(SlotLine).

    • Method Detail

      • getWinOdds

        int getWinOdds​(SlotLine slotLine)
        Returns the winning odds of the supplied line, or zero if it's not winning line.

        Note: You will need your SlotLine.equals(Object) method functioning correctly in order for this method to return anything other than zero.

        You may used getWinSimplified(SlotItem, SlotItem, SlotItem) if your SlotLine.equals(Object) does not function correctly. You will however loose marks in doing so.

        Parameters:
        slotLine - the SlotLine to obtain the odds for
        Returns:
        the winning odds of the supplied line, or 0

      • getWinSimplified

        int getWinSimplified​(SlotItem slot1,
                     SlotItem slot2,
                     SlotItem slot3)
        The simplified version of getWinOdds(SlotLine).

        This method functions in the same manner at getWinOdds(SlotLine), but does not rely on SlotLine.equals(Object).

        Note: You will loose marks for invoking this method.

        Parameters:
        slot1 - the SlotItem from wheel #1 in the line
        slot2 - the SlotItem from wheel #2 in the line
        slot3 - the SlotItem from wheel #3 in the line
        Returns:
        the winning odds of the supplied line, or 0
